ending_theme: #01: "Ukiyo ni Hana (浮世に華)" by Shoose (しゅーず) (ep 1)
#02: "Yume ni Yowasarete (夢に醉酔わされて)" by Hayami Show (速水奨) (ep 2)
#04: "Soraomoi ~Daddan Hito no Odori~ (空想い～ダッダン人の踊り～)" by Ken Ozawa (小澤廉) (ep 4)
#05: "Ganbarima Sengen (ガンバリマ宣言)" by Shigeo Komori (小森茂生) (ep 5)
#06: "Mukudori Bojou (ムクドリ慕情) by Hiroshi Kitadani (きただにひろし) (ep 6)
#08: "Roudousha no Ballad (労働者のバラッド)" by Asa (亜沙) (ep 8)
#09: "Koi no Hajimara Night (恋の始まらNight)" by Yuusuke Kobayashi (小林裕介) (ep 9)
#10: "Tokyo Shinobi Saki (東京しのび咲き)" by Piko (ピコ) (ep 10)
#11: "Dear Gemstones" by Yuuri Matsuoka (松岡侑李) (ep 11)
